ValidationRule.description: Valid shipping countries are: Australia, Guam, Malaysia, New Zealand, Saipan, Singapore
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($User.Id !='00570000001tweu',AND( RecordType.Name == 'EMAP Fuel Accounts', NOT(ISBLANK( ShippingState )), (ShippingCountry <> "Australia"), (ShippingCountry <> "Guam"), (ShippingCountry <> "Malaysia"), (ShippingCountry <> "New Zealand"), (ShippingCountry <> "Saipan"), (ShippingCountry <> "Singapore") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have entered wrong Shipping Country. Please enter correct Shipping country. Valid shipping countries are: Australia, Guam, Malaysia, New Zealand, Saipan, Singapore
